##### Remark

Recall for a GLM, the likelihood equations are
$$
\sum_{i=1}^N \frac{(y_i-\mu_i)x_{ij}}{\text{Var}(Y_i)}\left(\frac{d\mu_i}{d\eta_i}\right)=0, \mbox{ }j=0,1,\ldots,p.
$$
